channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ukraine, U.S. Will Meet About Trump’s Peace Plan to End War With Russia
item.description: President Trump lashed out at Ukraine even as the talks on his peace proposal were still taking place, accusing the country’s leadership of being ungr...

item.title: Tatiana Schlossberg, the granddaughter of JFK, says she has a rare terminal cancer
item.description: In an essay in The New Yorker , Tatiana Schlossberg says she has acute myeloid leukemia. She also criticized her relative, Robert F. Kennedy Jr.

item.title: Jamil Abdullah Al-Amin, Black Power Activist Known as H. Rap Brown, Dies at 82
item.description: A charismatic orator in the 1960s, he called for armed resistance to white oppression. As a Muslim cleric, he was convicted of murder in 2000 and died...

item.title: F.B.I. Letters Send Shivers Through California’s Political Inner Circle
item.description: The indictment of Gov. Gavin Newsom’s former chief of staff shocked many power players in California. Now, some wonder how far the investigation will ...

item.title: Texas men indicted in plot to take over Haitian island and enslave women and children
item.description: Gavin Weisenburg, 21, and Tanner Thomas, 20, planned to take over Gonave Island and murder all men on the island, prosecutors alleged.

item.title: The U.S. Transportation Department is urging air passengers to be on good behavior
item.description: Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy wants air travelers to be nice this holiday season. A new DOT campaign asks passengers to help each other and than...

item.title: Israel Military Commanders Punished Over Hamas Attack Mistakes
item.description: About a dozen people were told they face dismissal or discipline for mistakes tied to the deadly Hamas-led attack that set off the war in Gaza.

item.title: Ukraine, U.S. Will Meet About Trump’s Peace Plan to End War With Russia
item.description: President Trump lashed out at Ukraine even as the talks on his peace proposal were still taking place, accusing the country’s leadership of being ungr...

item.title: Former News Anchor Sentenced to 10 Years in Prison for Pandemic Fraud
item.description: The former anchor, Stephanie Hockridge, who once worked for a Phoenix station, participated in an elaborate scheme that illegally obtained more than $...

item.title: 50 schoolchildren escape captivity in Nigeria, more than 200 still held
item.description: Fifty of the 303 schoolchildren abducted from a Catholic school in Nigeria's Niger state have escaped and are now with their families.

item.title: Mamdani’s Meeting With Trump Scrambled the MAGA-Sphere
item.description: Prominent conservative influencers had different interpretations as they processed the meeting on podcasts and in social media posts.

item.title: G20 summit closes in South Africa after U.S. absence
item.description: The G20 closed in Johannesburg without a ceremonial hand over to the U.S., its next chair, after Washington boycotted the summit.

item.title: Can the World Move On Without the U.S.? G20 Leaders Gave It a Shot.
item.description: With the United States boycotting the summit, other nations sought to strike new deals, and some took a tougher tone with President Trump.

item.title: How a Sabotaged Ankle Monitor Ended Bolsonaro’s House Arrest
item.description: Shortly before he was expected to start serving a 27-year sentence, Brazil’s former president took a soldering iron to his tracking device.

item.title: Denmark’s Migration Model
item.description: The country is getting attention for its tough asylum policies. Can they serve as a bulwark against the far right?
